remarks: Create an atom under an element covered by the lattice unit.  Part of proof of Lemma B in [Crawley] p. 112.  ( ~ 1cvrat analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2015.)
statement:
l1cvat.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
l1cvat.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
l1cvat.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) $.
l1cvat.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
l1cvat.c $e |- C = ( <oL ` W ) $.
l1cvat.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
l1cvat.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
l1cvat.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
l1cvat.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. A ) $.
l1cvat.n $e |- ( ph -> Q =/= R ) $.
l1cvat.l $e |- ( ph -> U C V ) $.
l1cvat.m $e |- ( ph -> -. Q C_ U ) $.
l1cvat $p |- ( ph -> ( ( Q .(+) R ) i^i U ) e. A ) $.
